column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////What a majestical experience I had here yesterday. Our waiter Jeremy
column2: had excellent service and raved to my Mom and I about the handcrafted Bosscat Burger ordered the "Chef's Way." Truly I'm not a burger person but this melted in my mouth. I split it in half with my mom to share and instantly regretted that because I just couldn't get enough of it! I will go out as far on a limb to say it was
